page.title: 12HOME LIFE.
page.content: My name is ELAINE LENNOX and I live in the town of TROON.I am going to tell you about a normal day in my life.Iget up from sleep at 8 a.m.I know when to get up because I have an alarm clock which releases a long wailing sound when it is time to start a new day.As five days a week are school days I dress in my school uniform which consists of a grey skirt, white shirt,a school tie and a black blazer.I then go downstairs to the kitchen to eat my breakfast.My first meal of the day consists of cereal except on Saturdays when I have bacon and eggs, a cup of coffee and heaps of toasted bread.In the evening I drink fizzy drinks called lemonade while watching a home entertainment system called television.
